with this response it should work correctly :frowning: 

i tried with chrome 31 and firefox 25 the following steps:
1. create a folder called "very long folder name"
2. click on 'rename'
3. type "very" after "very" to make it "very very long folder name"
4. hit enter

it works correctly on my side on v6.0.0 with the standard apps enabled.

what apps do you have enabled, in case that one is messing up with the files view ?

that has also been my first idea. there are currently only the following default apps enabled:
activity
bookmarks
calendar
contacts
deleted files
documents
external sites
external storage support
first run wizard
full text search
pdf viewer
pictures
share files

text editor
versions

ok i think i remember something. there was an issue with this on rc6 i think. did you upgrade to the latest 6.0.0 ?
